doc.field: TO SELL 13.2 BILLION DLRS IN BILLS

- The U.S. Treasury said it will sell 13.2 billion dlrs of three and six-month bills at its regular auction next week. The April 6 sale, to be evenly divided between the three and six month issues, will result in a paydown of 1.65 billion dlrs as maturing bills total 14.85 billion dlrs. The bills will be issued April 9.
